item.title: C&T 5-Piece Hammer Set
item.dc:creator: lekhitanand456
item.description:
• Each pack comes with 5 hammers that include 16oz Ball Pein Hammer, 32oz Ball Peen Hammer, 32oz Rubber Mallet, 3lb Sledge Hammer and 3lb Cross Peen Hammer.
  • Forged from heat-treated high carbon steel, rust and corrosion resistant, forged carbon steel heads provide strength, durable, easy to clean.
  • Our set is designed with a non-slip TRP thermoplastic handle that features a high-strength fiberglass core to provide a secure and comfortable grip while helping absorb vibrations to reduce fatigue.
  • We use quality materials makes our hammers the perfect choice for most blow tasks you have in mind.
item.content:encoded:
C&T 5-Piece Hammer Set, 16oz Ball Pein Hammer | 32oz Ball Peen Hammer | 32oz Rubber Mallet | 3lb Sledge Hammer | 3lb Cross Peen Hammer,Fiberglass Handle & Mallet Set, With Shock Reduction Grip

Brand C&T
Head Material Carbon Steel
Handle Material Fiberglass
Item Weight 32 Ounces
Grip Type Shock Reduction

item.title: AMERICAN MUTT TOOLS Welding Chipping Hammer
item.dc:creator: lekhitanand456
item.description:
• Power through any job with our premium slag hammer welding tool. Its prime function is to efficiently remove slag and spatter from all welds, making it the perfect partner for any chipping hammer welding project.
  • Say goodbye to discomfort! Our welding chipping hammer boasts an ergonomic handle design, significantly reducing fatigue during use. This makes it one of the most user-friendly welding hammers available in the market today.
  • Enjoy superior convenience with our welders chipping hammer. The lightweight construction reduces arm fatigue, making it the go-to welding hammer for professionals and beginners alike.
item.content:encoded:
AMERICAN MUTT TOOLS Welding Chipping Hammer – 14 oz Welding Hammer Chipping Slag – Slag Hammer, Chipping Hammer Welding, Welder Hammer, Welding Chipping Hammer, Welders Chipping Hammer, Chipi Hammer

Brand AMERICAN MUTT TOOLS
Head Material Alloy Steel
Item Weight 14 Ounces
Grip Type Anti Slip, Ergonomic
Style German
